## Project current involved 
Now I am investigating the apparent depression of photosynthesis rates in 
temperate and boreal forests in spring after cold winters, 
which is a phenomenon that has been overlooked in global models. Through **[PhotoCold](https://www.wsl.ch/de/projekte/cold-stress-mighgt-limit-carbon-gain-also-in-a-warming-climate.html)** 
and **[Velux](https://veluxstiftung.ch/projects/)** projects, I intend to pinpoint the reasons cause this 
photosynthetic depression and improve the model efficiency. 


## Research Interest 
Biogeochemical Cycling, Biodiversity, Vegetation Phenology, 
Ecosystem Stability & Resilience, Economic development and environmental change
